name: Soapbox VR
description:
Welcome to the ultimate VR experience, no longer will you shoot at a VR man with a VR gun, you will now sit in a VR box and slide down a VR hill. Features innovative new mechanics such as: a steering wheel to steer, a brake lever for braking and leaning for leaning.

Soapbox VR is a multiplayer VR racing game made in one week with the collaboration of many many people. Players race against each other down a hill using only the power of gravity. It features 8 cars, 2 levels and a maximum of 16 players per server.

Requires:

  • VR headset
  • VR controllers
  • VR friends
  • Steam
  • Steam VR

All of the interactions in this game use the VR controllers.
